data.title: Claudia Jordan Height, Weight, Measurements, Bra Size, Shoe Size
data.meta_description: Claudia Jordan Height, Weight, Measurements, Bra Size, Shoe Size, Hair Color, Eye Color, Zodiac Sign, Ethnicity, Husband, Family, Facts.
data.text:
Claudia Jordan is an American Actress, Model, Reality Television, and Radio Personality. She became popular for appearing as a model for “Deal or No Deal” and “The Price Is Right”. Also, she appeared on the TV series “The Real Housewives of Atlanta” for seven seasons.

Claudia Jordan’s height is 5 feet 7 inches and her weight is 59 kilograms. Her body measurements are 34-25-37 inches, including her bra size 34B, waist size 25 inches, and hip size 37 inches. Moreover, Claudia Jordan wears 8 US shoe sizes and 6 US dress sizes. Her hair color is dark brown and her eye color is dark brown.

Claudia Jordan was born on 12 April 1973 in Providence, Rhode Island, United States of America. Her Zodiac Sign is Aries. Her father is African-American while her mother is Italian Native. Claudia Jordan got married to Datari Turner in 2009 but they divorced in 2010.

Claudia Jordan Personal Information

Date Of Birth: 12 April 1973

Birth Place: Providence, Rhode Island, USA

Birth Name: Claudia Angela Jordan

Nickname: Claudia Jordan

Zodiac Sign: Aries

Occupation: Reality TV personality, Model

Nationality: American

Ethnicity: White

Religion: Unknown

Hair Color: Dark Brown

Eye Color: Brown

Sexual Orientation: Straight

Claudia Jordan Body Statistics

Weight in Pounds: 130 lbs

Weight in Kilogram: 59 kg

Height in Feet: 5′ 7¾”

Height in Meters: 1.72 m

Body Measurements: 34-25-37 in (94-64-94 cm)

Breast Size: 34 inches (94 cm)

Waist Size: 25 inches (64 cm)

Hips Size: 37 inches (94 cm)

Bra Size: 34B

Shoe Size: 8 (US)

Dress Size: 6 (US)

Claudia Jordan Family Details

Father: African-American

Mother: Italian native

Husband: Datari Turner (m. 2009–2010)

Children: No

Siblings: Larry Jordan, Jr. (Brother)

Relationship History

She was in a relationship with Dwight Freeney, Maurice Greene, LM Garrett, Kevin Hart, and Chico DeBarge.

Claudia Jordan Education

East Providence High School, Baldwin Wallace University

She was educated at East Providence High School.

She majored in broadcasting and journalism from Baldwin Wallace College, Ohio.

Claudia Jordan Facts

She is of Italian descent on her mother’s side and African-American on her father’s side.

She began her television career as a model on Deal or No Deal.

She represented Rhode Island as Miss Teen USA in 1991 and Miss USA in 1997.

She joined The Real Housewives of Atlanta in 2014 and The Next:15 in 2016.

She co-hosted the 2009 Miss Universe Pageant with Billy Bush.

Read: Winona Ryder and Charlotte Riley.
